info.name: Tastytrade Api
info.description:
To start, update the Sessions/Login request with your username and password. The Login request stores your tastytrade session token in an environment variable called tt_auth_token. This auth token is automatically added to the Authorization header of all other requests in this collection.

Some requests require an account number that you can add in the params section of each request. Look for the "Path Variables" section and edit the value.

request.description: Update the "login" field with your username or email. Then update the "password" field. Once you submit this request, the auth token is stored in an environment variable called tt_auth_token. This auth token is automatically added to the Authorization header of all other requests in this collection.

item.name: Future Option Chains Nested by Symbol
OTOCO - Equity Option - Market Entry Copy

request.description: Returns all orders relevant to today. This includes any orders that were cancelled today.
